subject: Get a free quote now
body:
Are you over-paying for your auto insurance?

Lets find out!  The cost of auto insurance coverage for the same person can vary enormously - in some cases, by more than $2,000 per year. QuoteWizard takes the mystery out of shopping for insurance. 

Now, its easier than ever to shop
and compare the best rates for you!

Takes less than 2 minutes!
Simply answer a few quick questions, and you'll get side-by-side quotes from leading
companies-all at once.  Its that easy!
